casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dominique Jevon PERRY. No. 81A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 12, 2014. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Perry, Dominique Jevon. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney.

Opinion

The following Order was entered: Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(a) and (b)(2) and Rule 15(e)(2) of the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure, the Court on its own initiative hereby certifies for review prior to determination in the Court of Appeals State v. Dominique Jevon Perry, COA13-1117. The case shall be docketed in this Court as of the date this order. Briefs of the respective parties that have been submitted to the Court of Appeals shall be considered by this Court.
